did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Hannah Green Letters to Vincent McHugh,

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Stanford University. Libraries. Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: [Identification of item] Hannah Green Letters to Vincent McHugh, M1004, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: American writer. Received her masters' degree under Wallace Stegner at Stanford University, 1956. Known particularly for her THE DEAD OF THE HOUSE, 1972.

did.unittitle: TLS, 4pp. Camus' The Fall. Includes a check for $50.00 10/26/57
ALS/TLS, 5pp. Sections of novel for McHugh. 1/28/58
ALS/TLS, 1p. Text from work in progress. 3/24/58
ALS, 3pp. Kerouac's The Subterraneans and Proust. 6/4/58
ALS, 4pp. Kenneth Rexroth, Michael Grieg, and Kees 7/16/58
ALS, 3pp. The Death Of A Salesman. 7/19/58
ALS/TLS, 2pp. One page section from novel. 1/10/59
ALS/TLS, 4pp. One page section from novel. 1/12/59
ALS, 3pp. Jean Cocteau. Thomas the Impostor. 1/21/59
ALS, 4pp. Crevecoeur and Van Wyck Brooks. 2/4/59
ALS, 3pp. Tillie Olsen and Jessamyn West. 2/10/59
ALS, 7pp. The Seventh Seal. Wallace Stegner. 2/22/59
ALS/TLS, 6pp. A section of the novel enclosed. 2/24/59
ALS, 2pp. John Millington Synge's Playboy of the Western World. 2/27/59
ALS, 2pp. Ford Madox Ford's The Good Soldier. 4/28/59
ALS, 5pp. Film Some Like It Hot. C. H. Kwock 5/7/59
ALS, 6pp. Joseph Conrad's The Shadow Line. 5/25/59

scopecontent.p: This folder contains seventeen letters which have unclear postmarks, thus cannot be filed with the other letters.

did.unittitle: Vincent McHugh letters to Hannah Green
